name: The Whisperer in Darkness
description: Rumors resurface. Legends are resurrected. In this Lovecraftian visual novel, play as Alex N. Wilmarth, skeptic and professor at Miskatonic University, to unravel the hideous secrets centered at a secluded farm in the hills of Vermont, coming ever closer to mortal peril.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Any dual-core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 112 MB available space
